site_name: 229-255 And 277-279 Kingston Road  New MaldenKT3 3SW
decision_conditions: The details submitted in relation to Condition 50 (Mechanical Ventilation) of planning permission 19/01228/FUL are unsatisfactory. In particular, the number and design of vents are considered to result in an overbearing appearance which would have an adverse impact on visual amenity for future occupiers and the character and appearance of the building and surrounding area, contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 50 (Mechanical Ventilation) of planning permission 19/01228/FUL (Redevelopment of the site to provide 297 residential units in buildings ranging from 4 to 7 storeys, with 207 sq m commercial space (A1, A2, A3, A4, B1 and D1) at ground floor, 123 car parking spaces (including car club and accessible provision); communal landscaped amenity areas, secure cycle parking, stopping up of Avenue Terrace and other associated development)
